text_logic_form: The length of the line $RS$ is $x+9$ units.
The length of the line $ST$ is $2x$ units.
The length of the line $RT$ is $3x-9$ units.
Find the length of the line $RT$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The length of the line $RS$ is $x+9$ units.
The length of the line $ST$ is $2x$ units.
The length of the line $RT$ is $3x-9$ units.
Find the length of the line $RT$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $TA$ is $2x$ units.
The length of the line $RA$ is $x+9$ units.
The length of the line $RT$ is $3x-9$ units.
line_instances: There are lines $RA$, $RT$, and $TA$, forming the equilateral triangle $RST$.
